title: BONUS: Youth Radio Girl Mystery
description: Years ago, producer Yowei Shaw taught high school students how to make radio. And in one of her classes, something bizarre happened with one of her students, something that she's never been able to make sense of. In this episode, Yowei tracks down her former student and uncovers a story much stranger than she ever expected.

itunes:title: BONUS: Youth Radio Girl Mystery
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: When truth becomes stranger than fiction.
itunes:subtitle: When truth becomes stranger than fiction.
